name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5060
description: Budget-friendly Blackwell GPU with 8GB GDDR7. Brings ray tracing and DLSS 4.0 to mainstream gamers with excellent 1080p and solid 1440p performance.

reviews.review_text: Finally a budget card with proper ray tracing. Amazing value.
Perfect for my first gaming PC build. Handles everything.
8GB is tight for some newer games but DLSS helps.
